Technical Snapshot: $PAXG  4h Chart Signals Potential Bullish Breakout ğŸ“ˆ  The $PAXG  4h chart shows consolidation just below the recent swing high, suggesting a possible upward breakout. The bias remains bullish while key price levels dictate short-term directional risk.  A decisive close above resistance near 4385 could trigger a rally continuation, targeting that area after initial support holds around 4322. Should $PAXG  fail to breach 4385 and reverse, watch for a pullback toward 4322 support. A breakdown under 4287 on strong volume would shift the outlook toward further downside.
